pull.title: doc: update Fedora build instructions for cmake
pull.body:
Update Fedora build instructions for cmake:

- update the Fedora build requirements
- remove old configure instruction

This was forgotten to update

events.message: doc: update fedora build instructions for cmake

events.body:
ACK 877c55a68b65b30f226f4747829bc7336329e295
Tested with a fresh Fedora 40 install (and `-DENABLE_WALLET=OFF`)

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -96,7 +96,7 @@ Otherwise, if you don't need QR encoding support, use the `-DWITH_QRENCODE=OFF`
 
 Build requirements:
 
-    sudo dnf install gcc-c++ libtool make autoconf automake python3
+    sudo dnf install gcc-c++ cmake python3
comments.body: A build tool, such as `make` or `ninja`, is required. So I suggest to keep `make`.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -96,7 +96,7 @@ Otherwise, if you don't need QR encoding support, use the `-DWITH_QRENCODE=OFF`
 
 Build requirements:
 
-    sudo dnf install gcc-c++ libtool make autoconf automake python3
+    sudo dnf install gcc-c++ cmake python3
comments.body:
done.
(I removed it as I didn't need to install it, as it comes pre-installed on the fedora VM I used to test)
